channel.title: book notes on Raghavendra Kaushik
channel.description: Recent content in book notes on Raghavendra Kaushik

item.title: Zero to One notes
item.description: Disclaimer This is not a book summary. While reading, I occasionally take down notes in evernote. But they are mostly irregualar and unstructured. I just made notes of points, which I felt important or liked exteremely. Going through this will only give you a rough idea of what’s inside the book. At many places, I have not changed the lines from the book, so as to not reduce the impact!
